name: Dreamscape Reawakened (v0.1.1)
description:
The Dreamer Vs The Knightmare

After an unknown incident, an amnesiac washes up on the shores of Codorn Island. With the assistance of the only inhabitant, the identity of the amnesiac is confirmed. He is of a branch of the royal knights, the Dreamers. The Dreamers fight unseen entities and prevent calamities that the majority of the world would never even know about. They conjure spells using the very essence of dreams themselves and are feared for their power.

With the knowledge of his identity confirmed, the Dreamer sets off from Codorn Island to find the Dreamweaver Sword and prevent the world from falling at the hands of the Knightmare.

Controls - Keyboard

WASD - Move + Menu Navigation

Enter - Action Button

Backspace - Return Button
